ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request : Import / Export file formats (CSV, JSON)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello ! My data is in a huge csv file (2M lines). I would like to import it into a table. Ideally it would auto-create a table, taking the column names from the first line of CSV. I would like to upload the file from my local disk, from my web browser. As a bonus, it would be nice to have flexibility on the CSV format : my file is using "|" as a separator rather than "," (but I could transform my data before uploading it, so it's not a hard requirement. But it's preferable because I would like minimize the steps that I have to do in my workflow.) Thanks for this cool product !

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #177 from nocodb/fix/share-button-copy-url-feedback fix(nocodocs): Added feedback to share copy link button

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #179 from nocodb/fix/link-bugs Link bug fixes, improved cache key scheme and header tiptap nodes have placeholder when empty
